thread.title: Vijay Babu gets a Rambo makeover in Mudhugavu
thread.title_full: Vijay Babu gets a Rambo makeover in Mudhugavu - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Vijay Babu gets a Rambo makeover in Mudhugavu
text:
Actor Vijay Babu is now slowly carving a niche in Mollywood.
His latest film Mudhugavu will see him as a hardcore fan of Sylvester Stallone's John Rambo . About his negative character in the movie, the Nee-na actor says that he "plays a goon-turned-underworld don who is stuck in the 80s while the world has moved on."
"It's 1989 again for my character," he gushes. "I play the villain who is a die-hard fan of Rambo and so dresses up like him and has all the mannerisms of Rambo. My outfits include sweatpants, boxing gloves, headbands, and heavy artillery. I even sport his hairstyle."
While his name and get up seem funny, Vijay Babu says, "I am a very serious person in the movie. People refer to me as Rambo and I enjoy it." Mudhugavu stars Suresh Gopi's son, Gokul Suresh, and Arthana in the lead. The plot thickens when Rambo gets involved in the couple's life.
